pronunciation.pinyin: bá gēn hàn máo bǐ yāo cū
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: ba2 gen1 han4 mao2 bi3 yao1 cu1

meanings.value: lit. a hair plucked from (person A) would be thicker than (person B)'s waist
fig. A is far richer (or more powerful) than B
(used in a pattern such as A拔根汗毛比B的腰粗[A ba2 gen1 han4 mao2 bi3 B de5 yao1 cu1])
